name: Ken Krell
what_you_do: Seagrass Media, LLC provides business services.
social_proof: Set world record for OpportunityThon™--longest non-stop global digital success livestream with over 50 guests over 28 1/2 hours. Redefined the way homes are financed in the US Virgin Islands (brought lower prices, faster/better service and gave more people the opportunity to own homes). One of the world's top "sell from the stage" speakers--with over 35 years on stages globally. Pivoted to digital in 2009 and now taking it to the next level.
